openBackgroundPartsTaskDescription: Manage background parts for the process.
openBackgroundPartsTaskCriteria: This feature is available for work packages that have an EBOM.
removeBackgroundPartsCmdDesc: Unassign selection from background parts list.
cannotAssignBackgroundPart: "{0}" serves as the root of the Engineering BOM and therefore cannot be assigned as a background part.
noBackgroundPartsAssigned: There are no assigned background parts.
